comment: Johnny Depp is doomed without a question. His desire to revenge is slowly consuming him. comment: I like u grace and I like ur work, but saying Amber Heard didn‚Äôt start this fight is bs. She started this fight as soon as she accused him of abuse and started milking the public sympathy for her own publicity and collecting awards and speaking engagements from organisations against domestic violence. Since in America, silence is the same as guilt in the public sphere, one way or another it was goin to come to a head once Johnny Depp tried to defend himself. She enlisted the public and industry to fight her battle and he enlisted the courts. Johnny ain‚Äôt a saint. He has problems but it‚Äôs entirely possible for him to overcome them. But Amber using the industry and public opinion to beat up on him is a furtherance of the abuse he‚Äôs already received from her and u always having to add the caveat that they are both at fault every time u speak on this issue is just part of the social problem in dealing with this issue. The guy in these situations always gets a portion of the blame whether he did what he‚Äôs accused of or not. When a woman is caught out for something like this in that environment, ppl never just say ‚Äòshe‚Äôs shit, let‚Äôs move on‚Äô. It has to b ‚Äòwell he‚Äôs shit too‚Äô and at the end the industry forgives her faster than they do him.
